bridge-type.label: Tankerkönig Webservice
bridge-type.description: The Tankerkönig Webservice can handle 1 to 10 gas stations.

parameter.name: apikey
parameter.label: API-Key
parameter.description: API-Key. Necessary registration on the Tankerkönig website.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Time
parameter.description: Sets the refresh time. Minimum is 5 minutes.

parameter.name: modeOpeningTime
parameter.label: Opening Time
parameter.description: In mode Opening Time only those gas stations are polled that are actually open.

channel-type.label: Holiday
channel-type.description: ON if today is a holiday.
